title: AI powered 'cobots'
what: Reduce the need for humans in clean rooms
Make more reliable all satellites and spacecraft manufacturing steps that can be error-prone
Speed up the response of satellites to natural disasters
Analyse and review weather and environmental satellite images to monitor Earth and Mars
how: Uses the power of deep learning and AI-enabled recognition
Detailed imagery from a satellite can help those on the ground to see victims, determine the course of the disaster, and more

title: Circadian rhytm control
what: Induces a hibernation state during long-duration spaceflight
Prevents sleep disorders on Mars caused by a lack of a true diurnal cycle of sunlight (encompassing the same range of colour temperatures and intensities of sunlight experienced on Earth)
how: The intensity of light gets brighter as you proceed through the beginning of the workday
The light temperature gets progressively higher and the colour cooler to mimic the diurnal cycle
As the workday ends, the light gets only slightly dimmer but significantly lower in temperature and warmer in colour
As the sleep cycle begins, the light intensity dims, exposing occupants to even less blue light

title: CRISPR
what: Mars One colonists have modified DNA to prevent radiation-induced genetic damage
Address global food shortages by genetically modifying crops to stay fresh longer during longdistance transport
Allows crops to adjust and be fit to Mars atmosphere
how: The protein Cas9 (or CRISPR-associated) is an enzyme that acts like a pair of molecular scissors, capable of cutting strands of DNA

Long-term space travel and colonization of other planets exposes astronauts to the harsh environment of space for extended periods of time, so self-repairing DNA makes astronauts Sresistant to radiation
